title: Marvin O'Connor
text:
Marvin O'Connor (born 18 April 1991) is a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player of Australian descent. Originally a half-back, his current position is <a href="Wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">wing</a> and he now plays for the French <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a> club Stade Francais. 
O'Connor started playing at the age of 5 with Annemasse rugby club (Haute Savoie) before moving to Grenoble at the age of 16. He made his first appearance with the senior professional team <a href="FC%20Grenoble">FC Grenoble</a> in the <a href="Pro%20D2">Pro D2</a> in 2010 when still only 18 before moving to <a href="Aviron%20Bayonnais">Bayonne</a> in 2011.
